title: Selika Talbott: An EV/AV Reality Check
description:
Selika Talbott is the Founder and CEO of Autonomous Vehicle Consulting. She is a leading industry voice for responsible investment, engagement, and preparation for New Mobility including robot delivery, autonomous and electric vehicles, and self-driven freight.

On this show we discuss urban planning (the good, bad, and dumb); why EVs might not save the world; what entrepreneurs are doing wrong; the motivations behind EV mandates; the impact of lithium mines on communities and how to improve them; "Green washing"; why Times Square isn't a good example of how to make a city "walk-able"; and a LOT more.

 

Read more about her here: https://www.selikajosiahtalbott.com/about-2   

LinkIN: https://www.linkedin.com/in/selika-josiah-talbott

Twitter: https://twitter.com/sbjesq

Recorded October 15, 2022

 

That’s 20% off with free shipping at manscaped.com, and use code TIRE
 

The main course for Thanksgiving dinner can sometimes be a main source of stress! Not anymore. Sign up today at butcherbox.com/TIRE and use code TIRE to get one 10 to 14 pound Turkey FREE in your first box.

 

Want your question answered? To listen to the episode the day it's recorded? Want to watch the live stream, get ad-free podcasts, or exclusive podcasts? Join our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/thesmokingtirepodcast
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Selika Talbott)
